testsuites.name: Hive Test Run
testsuites.testsuite: Test suite covering the graphql API surface. The GraphQL tests were initially imported from the Besu codebase. This is a meta-test. It launches the client with the test chain and reads the test case files. The individual test cases are run as sub-tests against the client launched by this test. can't launch node (type besu_latest): client did not start: timed out waiting for container startup

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself). This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. can't launch node (type nethermind_latest): client did not start: timed out waiting for container startup

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself). This test attempts to sync the chain from a besu_latest node. This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly.

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself). This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. can't launch node (type erigon): client did not start: terminated unexpectedly

Test suite covering the graphql API surface. The GraphQL tests were initially imported from the Besu codebase. This is a meta-test. It launches the client with the test chain and reads the test case files. The individual test cases are run as sub-tests against the client launched by this test. Test was terminated by host

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself). This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. Test was terminated by host

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself). This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. Test was terminated by host

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself). This test attempts to sync the chain from a aleth_nightly node. Test was terminated by host
This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. Test was terminated by host
